review: Updating my review:  I am having a lot less problems with frequent resets than when I first received this.  I do not know if I am just more familiar with the item or if Amazon did some tweaking.  I have upgraded my review from 3 stars to 4 stars.  I really like this thing.  The only problem is that the center button on the controller is much too sensitive.  It is very frustrating when typing.  Otherwise, I would give it 5 stars.Needs to be reset too often.  Thanks to one of the reviewers who mentioned about a hard "reset" and how they he/she did it.  Otherwise this would have been a one star review.  If they fix this problem, I will rate it higher.

review: Easy to install, took my time and still got it installed in under 10 min. Great picture and sound, if you have only over the air stations, this is a great addition. Changes a standard TV into a smart TV. I only use the FireTV Stick for SlingTV and Netflix right now, have not yet gone to Amazon Prime. But the streaming is great, my wife even uses the FireTV Stick.
